org.drinkless.td.libcore.telegram

Class TG

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drinkless.td.libcore.telegram.TG

  • public final class TG
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for managing singleton-instance of class Client.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TG() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Client getClientInstance()
      This function returns singleton object of class Client which can be used for querying TDLib.
      static void setDir(java.lang.String dir)
      Sets directory for storing persistent data of TDLib.
      static void setUpdatesHandler(Client.ResultHandler updatesHandler)
      Sets handler which will be invoked for every incoming update from TDLib of type TdApi.Update.
      static void stopClient()
      This function stops and destroys Client.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TG

        public TG()

    • Method Detail

      • setUpdatesHandler

        public static void setUpdatesHandler(Client.ResultHandler updatesHandler)
        Sets handler which will be invoked for every incoming update from TDLib of type TdApi.Update. Must be called before getClientInstance().
        Parameters:
        updatesHandler - Handler to be invoked on updates.

      • setDir

        public static void setDir(java.lang.String dir)
        Sets directory for storing persistent data of TDLib. Must be called before getClientInstance().
        Parameters:
        dir - Directory to store persistent data.

      • stopClient

        public static void stopClient()
        This function stops and destroys Client. No queries are possible after this call, but completely new instance of a Client with different settings can be obtained through getClientInstance()

      • getClientInstance

        public static Client getClientInstance()
        This function returns singleton object of class Client which can be used for querying TDLib. setUpdatesHandler() and setDir() must be called before this function.
